summary: A college professor wakes up to find his wife has not returned home, then struggles to understand her disappearance.
cast: Jeff Daniels|Molly Price|Ben Shenkman|Gil Bellows|Michelle Held|Emily Bergl|Julian McMahon|Guy Sanville|Kristie Dickinson|Lisa Sodman Elzinga|Dennis North|Patrick Moug|Zach Grenier|Eros Biox|Bee Vary|Tom Whalen|Betsey Amid|Tricia Rose|Elizabeth Watson
title: La pesadilla
